channel.title: Arrow above head?
channel.description: How would I make it so when I have this npc spawn is has like the duel arena arrow above his head?

item.title: Arrow above head?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

/** * Show an arrow icon on the selected player. * @Param i - Either 0 or 10; 10 is arrow, 0 is none. * @Param j - The player/Npc that the arrow will be displayed above. * @Param k - Keep this set as 0 * @Param l - Keep this set as 0 */ public void drawHeadicon(int i, int j, int k, int l) { outStream.createFrame(254); outStream.writeByte(i); if (i == 1 || i == 10) { outStream.writeWord(j); outStream.writeWord(k); outStream.writeByte(l); } else { outStream.writeWord(k); outStream.writeWord(l); outStream.writeByte(j); } }

You can figure out the rest.

Read full topic
